nodes.text: Jarret J. Krosoczka, sometimes credited as simply Jarrett Krosoczka, is an author and illustrator. Krosoczka is known for his Lunch Lady graphic novel series, as well as numerous picture books such as Bubble Bath Pirates! and It's Tough to Lose Your Balloon!

Krosoczka wrote and illustrated Jedi Academy: A New Class, a new installment in the Star Wars: Jedi Academy series, which was released on July 26, 2016. A follow-up, Jedi Academy: The Force Oversleeps, was released on July 25, 2017. A third installment, Jedi Academy: The Principal Strikes Back, was released on July 31, 2018.
